text: 1.5 1 Kin 3.9-12, Snd 2.3-6, Jon 15.7, 1 Jo 5.14-15 Nɨbop ogɨnap pen gos tep yɨpɨd gɨl nɨgep ak wulep yapek, God nop agnɨgem nɨbop gos tep yɨpɨd gɨl nɨgep ak ñɨnɨgab. God bɨ binɨb kɨlop dɨtep yɨbɨl gup ak, kɨlop mɨdupsek pel tap kuŋay yɨbɨl monmon ñub. Pen nop agnɨgel, yɨp taynen agnepɨm agɨl, ma kelɨgup.
